message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Given its high value and quality, I believe it would be a great asset for you. I am offering this exceptional item to you for $15,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.

Alice, thank you for your offer, but $15,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm very interested in the product, but I can only afford to pay $12,000 at this time. Would you be willing to consider that price?
